channel.title: Help port fowarding on belkin router?
channel.description: :D please help if u guys or ladies have a moparscape server on a belkin router please post a pic of it i need to know how to do it i read musicmans guide but its for linksis and there way diferent so please help all u belkin router people out there i would realy apreciate :confused:

item.title: Help port fowarding on belkin router?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Service Death Service®
item.description:
@Death_Service wrote:

[put a check] [ Yourservername ] [inbound ports box [43594] [43594] ] [Tcp]
[192.168.2.2] [private port box [43594] [43594] ]

Read full topic

i dont have type wat i have is

[enable box] [ discription box ] [inbound ports box [port1] [port2] ] [type box]
[private ip adress box] [private port box [port1] [port2] ]

can you copy thsi and send back wat i put in each box please buddy…i realy want this

item.source: Help port fowarding on belkin router?

item.title: Help port fowarding on belkin router?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Service Death Service®
item.description:
@Death_Service wrote:

Description - your servername
Port - 43594
Enable - check
Type - any
ip address - 1-3

item.title: Help port fowarding on belkin router?
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

you got to portforward man.
ok this is how it work’s man go to start run type cmd than type ipconfig get your dns ip type that in your internet browser ok than go to port forwarding type in a name for your port forward type in your dns ip computer name leave blank choose any for trafiic type or tcp put in the port you want port forward check them and than you did it. oh yah and you need your router username and pass.

here is a ss.

[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 07:55:24 PM[/size][hr]I hope it help’s

Read full topic
